summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of a grant agreement with the Washington State Traffic Safety Commission for financial assistance to upgrade the "Total Station" surveying system that is used to investigate serious injury and fatal traffic accidents and the factors that contribute to their cause; increasing the 1997 Budget of the Police Department; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
